about_the_game:
"Not all mysteries can be explained by the logic of man. Some mysteries, beyond man, have no logic, have no fate.

In the face of such, keep your wits close, but do not trust them. Trust not yourself, nor your senses. Your time, nor your wit.

For where time has stopped, but its flow has no end. For when passion calls, but hate runs deep.

Heed this warning, and do not wait. For laws of nature and laws of man. Have no logic, and have no weight."



A global crisis that only continues to escalate. A dangerous run-in with a shadowy stranger. And a mysterious word that won't stop gnawing at you. How does everything tie together? And what role could you possibly play in all of this?

Enter a world of magic—of Fae and Dragon.



  • A Customizable Protagonist: Choose your name, pronouns, and personality
  • Personality: Shape your personality with four different traits (Bravery, Kindness, Wisdom, Charisma) and watch how the world interacts with it.
  • Free Time: Choose from four locations and go on a date of your choosing with any of our love interests.
  • Energy Vision: Tap into one of the MC's special abilities to see the different auras of the cast.
  • Memories: Revisit free time dates and let our love interests woo you as many times as you'd like.

CONTENT WARNING


  • Trigger Warning: Mention of mild violence, kidnapping, stalking, and mildly suggestive language.
  • Visual Warning: Various text and camera effects are used in-game, such as bouncing and jittering text, shaking camera effects, and flashes.
  • Auditory Warning: Loud SFX, such as thunder, are sometimes used.

short_description: Discover secrets long forgotten, and nurture relationships waiting to bloom. In a game inspired by the lore of Dragon and Fae, make choices that can shape your story, relationships, and even personality. Will you be brave, kind, wise, charismatic? Only you know the answer to your fate.
